function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of housing stability increases the risk of covid-19 infection, transmission, illness, and death","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases due to reduced outdoor socialization and increased time spent indoors.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate housing design and planning contributing to poor living conditions and increased disease susceptibility.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for the impact of remote work and online activities on mental and social wellbeing.","category":"Social","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Migration from urban to rural areas due to lack of space in multi-family risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of guidelines for residential buildings’ resilience to covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate social
